title: The question all support mains must one day ask themselves

replies.body: This doormat likes to make people think they can walk on them.... and then people find they trip. XD
You are indeed one clever doormat

Tbh only your gif can suitably show my reaction to this.
https://imgur.com/p0VhbVX.gif
I respect that.
Anyone who plays bot lane knows that the support is the one who wears the pants for the 10 or so minutes of a game.
Brand support wears the pants for the whole game.
Its true. Whenever I ADC I just follow my support around and hope they know what they are doing lol

> Anyone who plays bot lane knows that the support is the one who wears the pants for the 10 or so minutes of a game.

Not the "first" 10 or so minutes of a game mind you, just the 10 or so minutes of a whole game

I didn't even realize I got a comment from THE laughing fish :P

(Don't let that go to your head or you may be next on that ever-expanding list XD)

Too late, it already went right to me head:

https://i.imgur.com/BqfEnSb.png[/img]

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_YgpfIIn7X4I/Sz7g0Up1fjI/AAAAAAAAAVg/u1JfD8N_WjQ/s1600-h/post-12221-1241777344_thumb.jpg

The fish didn't heed my warning...

I joined one of my uni's LOL teams, and somehow we have 4 supp mains.
In that team, the other were discussing how the support is the ADC's bitch all game.

I asked them WTF they were doing when they support?
Any ADC I play with becomes my bitch, eventually the whole team does in the late game.

I like my supports like I like my women: In charge, violent, and overprotective af. A little bit of a god complex helps.  

When I ADC I just follow my support around and hope they know what they are doing lol
Understandable

A doormat?

I am the god damn roof above your heads!

to be honest, if supports were anything, they'd be a couch





as all adcs are potatoes {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

As an ADC main: 

I RESPECT YOU SUPPORT!

I appreciate you creating good plays and following up when I engage!

Stop taking relic shield on Thresh it's not viable anymore.

Stop blaming me for your death because you thought you could flash ignite.

Now as a support main:

Thanks for following up when I engage! I'll have your back when you decide to engage unless it's a dumb decision.

I respect your lategame. Until then I'm going to get you fed 90% of the time.

Stop blaming me for your death my abilities were on CD from defending you the first time.


In general, I feel that both ADCs and Supports are way too onesided. The reason I got to gold was that I knew how to play effectively both roles in botlane at once, meaning I know what supports do, and I know how to play around them/with them, and as a support I know how to synergize with my ADC. This is something both should do. Take a few steps in the other players' shoes.
